name: Coinman's Journey to the Moon
description:
Coinman wants to go to the moon! Can you help him?

Coinman's Journey to the Moon is a 3D casual arcade game inspired by doodle jump, where your goal is helping the main character "Coinman" reach the moon by jumping from platform to platform while dodging enemies and avoiding falling back to the ground.

Select from one of 15 different skins for your character and help get your favorite coin to the moon!

You have some helpful items at your disposal like rockets, trampolines and shields. These will randomly spawn on platforms. Collect them to reach the moon faster and safer! Note: You have to jump on the items from above in order to collect them.

As you go higher and higher item and enemy spawn chances will increase, platforms will spawn more spaced out and gravity of every object in the game will change!

Controls

A or Left Arrow - Move Left

R or Right Arrow - Move Right

S or Down Arrow or Space - Thrust Downwards

Known Bugs

  • Platforms can spawn on top of each other. The platform spawner in general can be buggy.
  • The collision with platforms can be a bit wonky at times.
  • Birds might fly backwards and there might be birds in space (don't ask).
  • The leaderboard might freeze if you try to exit while it's retrieving scores.

Credits

Background Music - Karl Casey @ White Bat Audio
